name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: The battle for Middle-Earth looms. How will you prepare? Play 1 of 5 characters - Frodo, Gandalf, Legolas, Aragorn, and Eowyn - all with different upgradeable abilities and different storylines. Unlock the surprise 6th character as you play through the game. Explore over 150 levels, over 30 for each character. Collect items in an adventure wherin hundreds are available. Battle Sauron's scabrous minions: Uruk-Hai clambering up the sheer walls of Helm's Deep, hordes of Orcs darkening the vast plains of Rohan, and the mighty Cave Troll in the echoing galleries of Balin's Tomb. Linked two-player action is possible via the GBA link cable.
